definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Verbs have to agree with their subjects.
sentences.chinese: 動詞的形格數要與主語保持一致。

sentences.english: Modals go in front of the subject in questions.
sentences.chinese: 情態動詞置於主語之前構成疑問句。

sentences.english: Change the form of these sentences. Your sentences must begin with the words in italics.
sentences.chinese: 改寫以下句子，將斜體印出的詞和詞組作主語。

sentences.english: Linking verbs are followed by a subject complement .
sentences.chinese: 連繫動詞之後須帶主語補語。

sentences.english: Yet this is not peculiar to substance, for it is also the case that differentiae cannot be present in subjects.
sentences.chinese: 不獨本體如此，因爲屬差也不能存在於主語之中。

sentences.english: The licensing of an indefinite subject is relative to the requirement of the topic.
sentences.chinese: 無定主語的允准跟是否有成分滿足話題需求有關。

sentences.english: Subiect is the third person, according to the agreement, which form of'have'should you use here?
sentences.chinese: 主語是第三人稱單數，根據主謂一致原則，助動詞。

sentences.english: The subject is the person or thing that the sentence is about.
sentences.chinese: 主語是句子所關涉的人或事物，其後加動詞詞組。

sentences.english: The subject deletion in tag-question is a common phenomenon in informal English.
sentences.chinese: 正式語體中，反意疑問句中主語省略是很常見的現象。

sentences.english: The analysis demonstrates that a locative subject serves as a peripheral member of subject, a functional category.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，處所主語是主語這一功能範疇的邊緣成員。

sentences.english: The analysis demonstrates that a locative subject serves as a peripheral member of subject, a functional category.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，處所主語是主語這一功能範疇的邊緣成員。

sentences.english: You'll also notice another feature of these examples of the imperative is that there is no subject.
sentences.chinese: 同時你可能也會注意到，這些祈使句是沒有主語的。

sentences.english: A verb must agree with its subject in person and number.
sentences.chinese: 動詞必需跟它的主語在人稱和數方點堅持一致。

sentences.english: Singular subjects go with singular verbs .
sentences.chinese: 單數主語與單數動詞連用。

sentences.english: Some things, again, are present in a subject, but are never predicable of a subject.
sentences.chinese: 有些事物存在於主語中，但是不能表述主語。

sentences.english: Some things, again, are present in a subject, but are never predicable of a subject.
sentences.chinese: 有些事物存在於主語中，但是不能表述主語。

definition: part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
